overview: One of the most visually stunning short films from the powerhouse duo of Cade Suing and Gavin Egger, Purple delivers a personal and heartfelt journey through the subtle but impactful acting of Chloe Irwin and Gavin Egger. A boy, (Gavin Egger) is faced with the seemingly simple but truly complex question of reaching out for the girl's (Chloe Irwin) hand while in a theatre. With no dialogue throughout the film, this proves to be one of the most audacious and masterful works by Suing and Egger.
tagline: It all comes down to a simple decision
title: Purple
